p: The fresh R. beesianus rhizome was collected from Guangxi Province of China in July 2019. The identity of this species was confirmed by Prof. Guoxiong Hu of Guizhou University. The voucher specimen (Voucher No: RB-20190711) was deposited at National & Local Joint Engineering Research Center for the Exploition of Homology Resources of Southwest Medicine and Food, Guizhou University.
